summary: Completed comprehensive PWA implementation testing for Monetrax. All PWA features are working correctly: manifest.json accessible with correct app metadata, service worker registered with offline caching, offline.html fallback page working, all icons (72x72 to 512x512) accessible, iOS splash screens accessible, PWA meta tags present in index.html, mobile responsive design working at 390x844 viewport.

pwa_manifest_validation: manifest.json contains app shortcuts for Add Transaction, Dashboard, Tax Summary
pwa_meta_tags: index.html contains viewport meta tag with proper mobile settings
service_worker_features: Service worker caches static assets on install
Service worker uses cache-first strategy for static assets
Service worker uses network-first strategy for API routes
Service worker serves offline.html for navigation requests when offline
offline_page: offline.html has proper styling matching app theme
mobile_responsive: Landing page renders correctly at 390x844 viewport (iPhone 14 Pro)
Login button visible and clickable on mobile
Feature cards stack properly on mobile
Get Started button visible in header on mobile
pwa_components: PWA install banner in index.html with proper styling
pwa_css_features: Safe area padding for notched devices

seed_data_creation: Temporary test user created and cleaned up for authenticated testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: PWA implementation fully tested and working. All static assets accessible at public URLs. Service worker caches static assets and handles offline mode. Install prompt shows on mobile browsers (beforeinstallprompt event). Network status indicator shows online/offline state. Icons generated for all required sizes (72x72 to 512x512). iOS splash screens generated for all device sizes. The PWA can be installed from Chrome/Safari 'Add to Home Screen'. Mobile responsive design works correctly at 390x844 viewport.
